channel.title: Fixing dfs to manually use?
channel.description: I was wondering if someone could help me out so I could right click my dfs when its wielded and click "operate" and it would shoot flames at what you are fighting.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 09, 2009, 10:16:06 am[/size][hr]can anyone give me a tip on where to even start?
